mapper.insert:
insert into moment
id,
user_id,
gmt_created,
gmt_modified,
is_deleted,
content,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
#{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update moment
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update moment set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
